Detailed Description

SioGlueSignalListener fowards SIO callbacks to a listening SerialTerminal

void SioGlueSignalListener::OnSignalChange (  SioGlueWrapper::SignalType  type,
void *  signal_parameter,
void *  user_parameter
) 
 

wrapper for callbacks of Sio glue layer; original interface: static void sio_glue_handler (glue_sig_t sig_code, void *sig_param, void *user_param)

Parameters:
type type of SIO signal, e.g. changed terminal lines
signal_parameter signal specific parameter e.g. state of terminal lines, see SioGlueWrapper::TermIos
user_parameter user specific parameter, e.g. a pointer to a signal handler class

void SioGlueSignalListener::sio_glue_handler (  glue_sig_t  sig_code,
void *  sig_param,
void *  user_param
)  [static]
 

Define the function pointer for the callback from the Sio Glue Layer

Parameters:
sig_code specifies type of SIO signal, e.g. changed terminal lines
signal_param signal specific parameter e.g. state of terminal lines, see SioGlueWrapper::TermIos
user_param user specific parameter, e.g. pointer to a signal handler class
